frameDefinitions: A Resource is depleted by some process, resulting in there being only a Remainder in existence some time into or after the process.
An entity goes through several versions, from initial to final.
These words relate to the relative ordering of two events or times.
A Cognizer holds a particular Opinion, which may be portrayed as being about a particular Topic.
A Process of using or modifying is scheduled to be applied to a group or mass.
A Cognizer calls up an episodic memory of past Experience or an Impression of a Salient_entity formed  on the basis of past experience.
frameExamples: There are only two poems <t>left</t> from Quayle
<t>After</t> she arrived , she laid out her papers on the desk.
John <t>thinks</t> that it looks better back .
Three more cars <t>remain</t> to be fixed.
Kozmo could <t>remember</t> when his modem was the fastest he could buy.
listRoleDefinitions: The part of the Resource that the Process has not yet applied to.
The original set of items to which the Depletive_process applies one after the other.
The individual who owned the Resource that is being depleted.

A temporal setting or event which metonymically stands for the entities that were in existence then. The <fen>Remainder</fen> is part of the <fen>Original_context</fen>. This role occurs especially when abstract entities such as social institutions are seen as <fen>Resource</fen>s.
The Time when the amount of the Resource that is let is assessed.
The <fen>Item</fen> is one version among several versions (which may or may not yet exist), progressively getting closer to a final version.

The <fen>Focal_occasion</fen> is the event which is  being located in time with respect to some other event: The <fen>Focal_occasion</fen> is profiled, in contrast to the <fen>Landmark_occasion</fen>, which is backgrounded.
The <fen>Landmark_occasion</fen> is the event  with respect to which the <fen>Focal_occasion</fen> is located.
The <fen>Focal_participant</fen> is the participant in the <fen>Focal_occasion</fen> which is profiled as being in a relation of relative time to the <fen>Landmark_occasion</fen>.
The <fen>Cognizer</fen> is the person whose <fen>Opinion</fen> is in question.
The <fen>Cognizer</fen>'s way of thinking, which is not necessarily generally accepted, and which is generally dependent on the <fen>Cognizer</fen>'s point of view.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has the <fen>Opinion</fen>.
The activity that is being applied to the mass or the set of entities.
The mass or group that has not yet been processed.
The time when the <fen>Remainder</fen> is assessed.
A person who recalls memories of past experience or impressions.
A person or thing that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> remembers as being involved in some state or event or as having some property.
A past event or state that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> witnessed and is now recalling. The <fen>Experience</fen> may be a specific event or state or a vaguer period that is treated as a unit.

A property that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> attributes to the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> based on their past experience of the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> or a category to which the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> is assigned.
A property or role that a <fen>Salient_entity</fen> actually held and which frames the memories that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has of the <fen>Salient_entity</fen>.
The time when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> remembers the experience.
listRoleExamples: Only two poems are left <fex>from Virgil Smithers</fex>
Only the Beaux Arts cinema is left <fex>from the golden era of the 1940s</fex>
<fex>In 1910</fex>, only two of the Renaissance buildings remained
<fex>Hours of eating and drinking</fex> followed the wedding ceremony.
Hours of eating and drinking followed <fex>the wedding ceremony</fex>.
<fex>My</fex> take is that Johnson will not actually make it to the last round .

My take is <fex>that it is a version of the Macbeth story - what happens when people
become violent but cannot quite handle it</fex>.
An additional eighty-three invitations remain <fex>to be sent</fex>
In this case everyone should be informed by word of mouth to contact the person holding the list to find out <fex>which gifts</fex> still remain to be bought.
<fex>Now</fex> only three more items remain to be sold
I will truly miss Delmar and <fex>I</fex> will always remember when his eyes lit up everytime he got ice-cream.
today I saw a sister's exclassmate, and didn't recognise him, I remember <fex>him</fex> taller.
I can still remember <fex>saying the pledge every morning before class in elementary school</fex>, a rare occurrence among elementary school kids nowadays.
I remember Peter <fex>as immensely kind in those first three weeks before I was packed off to boarding school</fex>.
Atulprasad is principally remembered <fex>as a musician and composer</fex>.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: Article 112 of the Act on Bankruptcy
